column3: muhun ɔbɔfo bi so a ofi sor risian ba a ɔwɔ tum kɛse; na n'enyimnyam hyerɛɛn asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔdze ndze a ɔyɛ dzen tseaa mu dɛ
column7: nye nnoma a hɔn ho nntsew na wokyir hɔn nyina atsɛwee."

column2: "Osiandɛ amanaman nyina anom ne ndwamanyɛ ebufuw wenyin no bi; na asaase do ahemfo nye no agor ndwamangor
column3: na wiadze eguadzifo nam n'adɔkɔdɔkɔdzepɛ ahoɔdzen do enya hɔnho."

column2: "Na metsee dɛ ndze fofor bi so fi sor rese dɛ
column6: na hom nsa aannka no mbusuhaw no bi:"

column2: "osiandɛ ne ndzeyɛbɔn atsen ekodu sor mpo
"Hom ntua no kaw dɛ mbrɛ otuae
column3: hom mfa mbɔho ebien mma no dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse: kɔɔpow a ɔforae no
column4: hom mmfora no mbɔho ebien mma no."

column2: "Dodow a ɔhyehyɛɛ noho na ɔyɛɛ adɔkɔdɔkɔdzepɛ no
column3: hom mma no ɔhaw nye awerɛhow dɛmara. Osiandɛ ɔka wɔ n'akoma mu dɛ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi no mbusuhaw bɛba da kor mu
column3: owu nye awerɛhow nye ɔkɔm; na wɔdze gya bɛhyew no koraa
column4: osiandɛ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn a obu no atsɛn no ɔyɛ otumfo."

column2: "Na asaase do ahemfo a wɔnye no bɔɔ edwaman na wɔnye no tsenaa adɔkɔdɔkɔdzepɛ mu no
column3: sɛ wohu ne nhyewee no wusiw a

column7: kurow a ɔyɛ dzen! Osiandɛ dɔnhwer kor mu na w'atsɛmbu aba."

column2: "Na asaase do eguadzifo su no dzi no nkɔmbɔ
column3: osiandɛ obi nntɔ hɔn eguadze bio;"

column9: nye ndwindze a wɔdze ndua a ɔsom bo

column3: na w'anomudɛdze nye wo ndzepa efi wo nkyɛn abɔ wo

column3: na woesu na woedzi nkɔmbɔ dɛ:"

column4: kurow kɛse a ofuraa ndwera pa
column6: na ɔhyehyɛ sika nye aboɔdzen bo

column4: nye dodow a wɔyɛ po do edwuma
column7: "na wohun ne nhyewee no wusiw no
column9: Ebɛn kurow nna ɔtse dɛ kurow kɛse yi?"

column2: "Na wotuu dɛtse guu hɔn etsifi
column3: na wɔdze osu nye nkɔmbɔdzi tseaa mu dɛ
column6: kurow kɛse a w'aboɔdzendze ntsi hɔn a wɔwɔ hɛn wɔ po do nyina enyinya hɔnho wɔ mu! Osiandɛ dɔnhwer kor pɛr mu na wɔayɛ no amamfo."

column2: "Ao Ɔsor
column6: nye nkɔnhyɛfo; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ebu no atsɛn ama hom."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo baako hoɔdzenfo bi maa ɔbo a ɔtse dɛ ewuyambo kɛse bi do
column6: kurow kɛse no akyen hwii nye no

column2: "Na wɔrenntse asankubɔfo
column5: nye totorobɛntohɛmfo ndze wɔ wo mu bio; na worunnhu edwindzi biara ho dwimfo wɔ wo mu bio; na wɔrenntse ewuyambo nka wɔ wo mu bio;"

column2: "na kandzea ne kan rennhyerɛn wɔ wo mu bio
column3: na wɔnnkɛtse ayeforkun nye ayefor ndze wɔ wo mu bio: w'eguadzifo yɛɛ asaase do ahemfo; osiandɛ edze w'ator nkongyaa daadaa aman nyina."

column2: "Na no mu na wohun nkɔnhyɛfo
column4: nye hɔn a woeku hɔn asaase do nyina hɔn bɔgyaa."
